data.title: Drew Sidora Mourns Death of Her Father After His Battle With Alzheimerâ€™s Disease
data.meta_description: The reality star shared a touching video tribute to her dad on social media.
data.text:
Drew Sidora is grieving the death of her father after his battle with Alzheimerâ€™s disease.

â€œThe Real Housewives of Atlantaâ€ star shared a touching video tribute to her dad on Instagram on Monday (August 15). The post included Luther Vandrossâ€™ â€œDance With My Fatherâ€ in the background, as reported by Page Six.

â€œYouâ€™re never prepared for the inevitable, but here we areâ€¦. It is with tears flowing, I announce that my father Dr. Robert A. Jordan has made his transition into Heaven.â€ she began the postâ€™s caption. â€œAs my mom says, He fought a good fight and finished his race, with a smile on his face he picked up his crown at Heavenâ€™s Gate!â€

Sidora also extended a token of gratitude to those who have been supportive of her throughout her fatherâ€™s health struggle.

â€œThank you to all of you constantly messaging and writing me, sharing your own personal experiences with a loved one battling Alzheimerâ€™s Disease and Dementia. Weâ€™re forever connected,â€ she wrote.

She added that she will cherish the close relationship she had with her father.

â€œI was a Daddyâ€™s Girl and I will cherish the precious memories that will forever live in my heart and his legacy lives forever!â€ she wrote.

Drew also shared that Jordan was more than just her father. He was a pillar in the community whose mission was to serve those in need.

â€œHe was the best pediatrician in all of Chicago and if you knew, you knew! He was passionate about helping people, saving lives and providing quality healthcare to those in the indigent community,â€ wrote Sidora. â€œHe served 4 generations or patients within his practice and he will truly be missed. He had the most humble and sweetest spirit and we will celebrate HIS LIFE!!!!!â€
